name: Asterio
description:
Simple space shooter game like the iconic Asteroid game.

Comment your best score, mine is 2560 !

Gameplay

Shoot the asteroids to gain points in 3 minutes. If an asteroid hit your ship, you lose half of your points !

Controls

  • Move ship with ZQSD and orient it with your mouse (or left and right arrows).
  • Shoot with left click (or up arrow), or press space for auto-shoot.
  • Echap to pause the game

Bonus

  • Red : double
  • Green : laser
  • Blue : triple
  • Yellow : wave
  • Purple : homing
  • Orange : fragmentation

Later this can run for online multiplayer like .io games.
